type=\"text/javascript\">\n\n\n        $(\"html\").addClass('ipsfocus_bg1');\n\n  \n$(document).ready(function(){\n\n\n  \n\nfunction debounce(func, wait, immediate) {\n\tvar timeout;\n\treturn function() {\n\t\tvar context = this, args = arguments;\n\t\tvar later = function() {\n\t\t\ttimeout = null;\n\t\t\tif (!immediate) func.apply(context, args);\n\t\t};\n\t\tvar callNow = immediate && !timeout;\n\t\tclearTimeout(timeout);\n\t\ttimeout = setTimeout(later, wait);\n\t\tif (callNow) func.apply(context, args);\n\t};\n};\n\nvar detectDevice = function(){\n\tvar grabPageWidth = $('body').css('min-width');\n\treturn parseFloat(grabPageWidth, 10);\n}\ndetectDevice();\n/*\n\tDesktop = 30\n\tTablet = 20\n\tMobile = 10\n*/\n\n\n// Relocate search bar\nvar relocateSearch = function(){\n\tif (detectDevice() > 25){\n\t\t$(\"#elSearch\").prependTo(\"#searchWrap\");\n\t} else {\n\t\t$(\"#elSearch\").prependTo(\"#respSearch\");\n\t}\n}\nrelocateSearch();\n\n\nvar resizeWindow = function(){\n    var wClasses = \"wDesktop wTablet wMobile\"\n\tif(detectDevice() === 30){\n\t\t$(\"body\").removeClass(wClasses).addClass(\"wDesktop\");\n\t} else if(detectDevice() === 20){\n\t\t$(\"body\").removeClass(wClasses).addClass(\"wTablet\");\n\t} else {\n\t\t$(\"body\").removeClass(wClasses).addClass(\"wMobile\");\n\t}\n}\nresizeWindow();\n\n\n// Bug fix: The resize event is triggered when tablets and mobiles are scrolled, breaking the search bar in Android and Chrome\nvar cachedDevice = detectDevice();\n\n// Run width functions after 1000ms pause\n$(window).resize(debounce(function(){\n\tvar newDevice = detectDevice();\n    if(newDevice !== cachedDevice){\n        \n        resizeWindow();\n        relocateSearch();\n        \n        cachedDevice = newDevice;\n    }\n}, 1000));\n\t\n\n// Hide post controls as a guest to prevent empty bar\n$(\".cPost .ipsComment_controls li.ipsHide:only-child\").parent().hide();\n\n// Hide gallery descriptions if they don't exist\nif ($('.galleryDescription .ipsType_richText').is(':empty')){\n    $(\".galleryDescription\").hide();\n}\n\n// Hide empty divs in ipsPageHeader to prevent unnecessary margins\n$('.ipsPageHeader .ipsSpacer_top').each(function(){\n    if(!/[\\S]/.test($(this).html())) { \n        $(this).hide();\n    }\n});\n      \n      \n// Toggle class\n$('[data-toggleClass]').on( \"click\", function(event) {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    var toggleClass = $(this).attr('data-toggleClass');\n    $('html').toggleClass(toggleClass);\n});\n\n\nif (detectDevice() > 25){\n\t\n\t// Add blurred elements only on desktop\n\tvar addBlurTo = \".ipsBreadcrumb, #header, #userBar, #ipsf_picker, class='blur-image'></div></div>\" );\n\t\n\t$( \".blur-image-wrap\").each(function(){\n\t\n\t    // Windows offset needs to be different due to scrollbar\n\t    if (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Mac OS X') != -1) {\n\t        // Mac\n\t        var boxPositionTop = $(this).offset().top - 5;\n\t        var boxPositionLeft = $(this).offset().left - 5;\n\t    } else {\n\t        // PC\n\t        var boxPositionTop = $(this).offset().top + 3;\n\t        var boxPositionLeft = $(this).offset().left + 3;\n\t    }\n\t\n\t    $(this).css({ \"background-position\" : \"-\" + boxPositionLeft + \"px -\" + boxPositionTop + \"px\" });\n\t});\n\n}\n\n\n\n  \n\n/* Navigation */            \nfunction ipsfocusNavigation() {\n\t\n\tvar navwidth = 0;\n\tvar morewidth = $('.ipsNavBar_primary .focusNav_more').outerWidth(true);\n\t$('.ipsNavBar_primary > ul > li:not(.focusNav_more)').each(function() {\n\t\tnavwidth += $(this).outerWidth( true ) + 2;\n\t});\n\tvar availablespace = $('.ipsNavBar_primary').outerWidth(true) - morewidth;\n\tif (availablespace > 0 && navwidth > availablespace) {\n\t\tvar lastItem = $('.ipsNavBar_primary > ul > li:not(.focusNav_more)').last();\n\t\tlastItem.attr('data-width', lastItem.outerWidth(true));\n\t\tlastItem.prependTo($('.ipsNavBar_primary .focusNav_more > ul'));\n\t\tipsfocusNavigation();\n\t} else {\n\t\tvar firstMoreElement = $('.ipsNavBar_primary li.focusNav_more li').first();\n\t\tif (navwidth + firstMoreElement.data('width') < availablespace) {\n\t\t\tfirstMoreElement.insertBefore($('.ipsNavBar_primary .focusNav_more'));\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\t\n\tif ($('.focusNav_more li').length > 0) {\n\t\t$('.focusNav_more').removeClass('focusNav_hidden');\n\t} else {\n\t\t$('.focusNav_more').addClass('focusNav_hidden');\n\t}\n\t\n}\n\n$(window).on('load',function(){\n\t$(\".ipsNavBar_primary\").removeClass(\"hiddenLinks\");\n  \tipsfocusNavigation();\n});\n \n$(window).on('resize',function(){\n\tipsfocusNavigation();\n});\n\n\n// Make hover navigation work with touch devices\n// t)&&!navigator.msMaxTouchPoints&&!navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().match(/windows phone os 7/i))return false;this.each(function(){var t=false;e(this).on(\"click\",function(n){var r=e(this);if(r[0]!=t[0]){n.preventDefault();t=r}});e(n).on(\"click touchstart MSPointerDown\",function(n){var r=true,i=e(n.target).parents();for(var s=0;s<i.length;s++)if(i[s]==t[0])r=false;if(r)t=false})});return this}})(jQuery,window,document);\n\n$('.ipsNavBar_primary > ul > li:has(ul)').doubleTapToGo();\n  \n\n\n\n (staticProps) defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }; }();\n\nfunction _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError(\"Cannot call a class as a function\"); } }\n\nfunction _possibleConstructorReturn(self, call) { if (!self) { throw new ReferenceError(\"this hasn't been initialised - super() hasn't been called\"); } return call && (typeof call === \"object\" || typeof call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { 'x08_april_fools.png',\n  date: '04/01',\n  duration: 1\n}, {\n  name: 'x01_MyFirstStory_Halloween_Banner.png',\n  date: '10/16',\n  duration: 16\n}, {\n  name: 'x07_xmas_banner_versailles.jpg',\n  date: '12/24',\n  duration: 8\n}];\n\nvar BannerContainer = function (_React$Component) {\n  _inherits(BannerContainer, _React$Component);\n\n  function BannerContainer() {\n    _classCallCheck(this, BannerContainer);\n\n    var _this = _possibleConstructorReturn(this, (BannerContainer.__proto__ || Object.getPrototypeOf(BannerContainer)).call(this));\n\n    _this.state = {\n      currentBanner: -1,\n      bannerName: undefined\n    };\n    _this.PATH = '/public/assets/banner/img/';\n    _this.DELAY = 20000;\n    return _this;\n  }\n\n  _createClass(BannerContainer, [{\n    key: 'componentDidMount',\n    value: function componentDidMount() {\n      if (!this.getFixedBanner()) this.rotateBanners();\n    }\n  }, {\n    key: 'getFixedBanner',\n    value: function getFixedBanner() {\n      var count = this.props.fixedBannersList.length;\n      var i = void 0;\n      var duration = void 0;\n      var start = void 0;\n      var end = void 0;\n      var banner = void 0;\n\n      for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {\n        duration = this.props.fixedBannersList[i].duration || 1;\n        start = new Date(this.normalizeDate(this.props.fixedBannersList[i].date));\n        end = new Date(start).setDate(start.getDate() + duration);\n\n        if (this.getToday() >= start && this.getToday() < end) {\n          banner = this.props.fixedBannersList[i].name;\n          break;\n        }\n      }\n\n      if (typeof banner === 'undefined') return false;\n\n      this.setState({\n        bannerName: banner\n      });\n\n      return true;\n    }\n  }, {\n    key: 'rotateBanners',\n    value: function rotateBanners() {\n      var _this2 = this;\n\n      this.randomBanner();\n\n      setInterval(function () {\n        _this2.randomBanner();\n      }, this.DELAY);\n    }\n  }, {\n    key: 'randomBanner',\n    value: function randomBanner() {\n      var count = this.props.bannersList.length;\n      var num = void 0;\n\n      do {\n        num = Math.floor(Math.random() * count);\n      } while (this.state.currentBanner === num);\n\n      this.setState({\n        currentBanner: num\n      });\n    }\n  }, {\n    key: 'getToday',\n    value: function getToday() {\n      return new Date();\n    }\n  }, {\n    key: 'normalizeDate',\n    value: function normalizeDate(date) {\n      var i = void 0;\n      date = date.split('/');\n\n      for (i in date) {\n        if (date[i].length === 2 && date[i].toString().charAt(0) === '0') {\n          date[i] = date[i].charAt(1);\n        }\n      }\n\n      return date.join('/').concat('/' + this.getToday().getFullYear().toString());\n    }\n  }, {\n    key: 'render',\n    value: function render() {\n      var _this3 = this;\n\n      var banner = void 0;\n\n      if (typeof this.state.bannerName !== 'undefined') {\n        banner = React.createElement(Banner, { banner: this.PATH + this.state.bannerName });\n      } else {\n        banner = this.props.bannersList.map(function (banner, index) {\n          return React.createElement(Banner, {\n            banner: _this3.PATH + banner,\n            hidden: _this3.state.currentBanner !== index\n          });\n        });\n      }\n\n      return React.createElement(\n        'div',\n        { className: 'banner' },\n        banner\n      );\n    }\n  }]);\n\n  return BannerContainer;\n}(React.Component);\n\nvar Banner = function (_React$Component2) {\n  _inherits(Banner, _React$Component2);\n\n  function Banner() {\n    _classCallCheck(this, Banner);\n\n    return _possibleConstructorReturn(this, (Banner.__proto__ || Object.getPrototypeOf(Banner)).apply(this, arguments));\n  }\n\n  _createClass(Banner, [{\n    key: 'render',\n    value: function render() {\n      var bannerStyle = {\n        height: 100,\n        margin: '4px 0',\n        width: 720\n      };\n\n      return React.createElement('img', {\n        className: 'animated fadeIn',\n        src: this.props.banner,\n        style: bannerStyle,\n        hidden: this.props.hidden\n      });\n    }\n  }]);\n\n  return Banner;\n}(React.Component);\n\nReactDOM.render(React.createElement(BannerContainer, { bannersList: bannersList, fixedBannersList: fixedBannersList }), document.getElementById('banner'));\n//# (staticProps) defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }; }();\n\nfunction _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError(\"Cannot call a class as a function\"); } }\n\nfunction _possibleConstructorReturn(self, call) { if (!self) { throw new ReferenceError(\"this hasn't been initialised - super() hasn't been called\"); } return call && (typeof call === \"object\" || typeof call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if (\"value\" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } } return function (Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }; }();\n\nfunction _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError(\"Cannot call a class as a function\"); } }\n\nfunction _possibleConstructorReturn(self, call) { if (!self) { throw new ReferenceError(\"this hasn't been initialised - super() hasn't been called\"); } return call && (typeof call === \"object\" || typeof call === \"function\") ? call : self; }\n\nfunction _inherits(subClass, superClass) { if (typeof superClass !== \"function\" && superClass !== null) { throw new TypeError(\"Super expression must either be null or a function, not \" + typeof superClass); } subClass.prototype = Object.create(superClass && superClass.prototype, { constructor: { value: subClass, enumerable: false, writable: true, configurable: true } }); if (superClass) Object.setPrototypeOf ? Object.setPrototypeOf(subClass, superClass) : subClass.__proto__ = superClass; }\n\nvar Review = function (_React$Component) {\n  _inherits(Review, _React$Component);\n\n  function Review() {\n    _classCallCheck(this, Review);\n\n    var _this = _possibleConstructorReturn(this, (Review.__proto__ || Object.getPrototypeOf(Review)).call(this));\n\n    _this.state = {\n      file: 'banners.json',\n      banners: []\n    };\n    _this.URL = 'https://www.monochrome-heaven.com/';\n    _this.PATH = '/public/assets/review/';\n    return _this;\n  }\n\n  _createClass(Review, [{\n    key: 'componentWillMount',\n    value: function componentWillMount() {\n      var _this2 = this;\n\n      var file = this.URL.replace(/\\/$/, '') + this.PATH + this.state.file;\n      var init = {\n        cache: 'no-cache'\n      };\n\n      fetch(file, init).then(function (res) {\n        return res.json();\n      }).then(function (data) {\n        _this2.setState({\n          banners: data.banners.slice(0, 10)\n        });\n      });\n    }\n  }, {\n    key: 'render',\n    value: function render() {\n      if (location.href !== this.URL) return false;\n\n      return React.createElement(\n        'div',\n        { className: 'review animated fadeIn' },\n        React.createElement(\n          'h3',\n          { className: 'review__header' },\n          'Official Reviews'\n        ),\n        React.createElement(ReviewBanner, { banners: this.state.banners })\n      );\n    }\n  }]);\n\n  return Review;\n}(React.Component);\n\nvar ReviewBanner = function (_React$Component2) {\n  _inherits(ReviewBanner, _React$Component2);\n\n  function ReviewBanner() {\n    _classCallCheck(this, ReviewBanner);\n\n    var _this3 = _possibleConstructorReturn(this, (ReviewBanner.__proto__ || Object.getPrototypeOf(ReviewBanner)).call(this));\n\n    _this3.state = {\n      currentBanner: 0,\n      imgClassName: 'review__img',\n      timer: undefined\n    };\n    _this3.PATH = '/public/assets/review/img/';\n    _this3.SLIDE_IN_LEFT = 'review__img animated slideInLeft';\n    _this3.SLIDE_IN_RIGHT = 'review__img animated slideInRight';\n    _this3.slideBanner = _this3.slideBanner.bind(_this3);\n    _this3.prevBanner = _this3.prevBanner.bind(_this3);\n    _this3.nextBanner = _this3.nextBanner.bind(_this3);\n    _this3.goToBanner = _this3.goToBanner.bind(_this3);\n    return _this3;\n  }\n\n  _createClass(ReviewBanner, [{\n    key: 'componentDidMount',\n    value: function componentDidMount() {\n      this.slideBanner();\n    }\n  }, {\n    key: 'slideBanner',\n    value: function slideBanner() {\n      this.setState({\n        timer: setInterval(this.nextBanner, 10000)\n      });\n    }\n  }, {\n    key: 'prevBanner',\n    value: function prevBanner() {\n      var imgClassName = this.state.currentBanner > 0 ? this.SLIDE_IN_LEFT : this.SLIDE_IN_RIGHT;\n      var currentBanner = this.state.currentBanner === 0 ? this.props.banners.length - 1 : --this.state.currentBanner;\n\n      this.setState({\n        currentBanner: currentBanner,\n        imgClassName: imgClassName\n      });\n    }\n  }, {\n    key: 'nextBanner',\n    value: function nextBanner() {\n      var imgClassName = this.state.currentBanner < this.props.banners.length - 1 ? this.SLIDE_IN_RIGHT : this.SLIDE_IN_LEFT;\n      var currentBanner = this.state.currentBanner === this.props.banners.length - 1 ? 0 : ++this.state.currentBanner;\n\n      this.setState({\n        currentBanner: currentBanner,\n        imgClassName: imgClassName\n      });\n    }\n  }, {\n    key: 'goToBanner',\n    value: function goToBanner(index) {\n      if (this.state.currentBanner === index) return;\n\n      var imgClassName = this.state.currentBanner > index ? this.SLIDE_IN_LEFT : this.SLIDE_IN_RIGHT;\n\n      this.setState({\n        currentBanner: index,\n        imgClassName: imgClassName\n      });\n    }\n  }, {\n    key: 'render',\n    value: function render() {\n      var _this4 = this;\n\n      var banners = this.props.banners.map(function (banner, index) {\n        return React.createElement(\n          'a',\n          { href: banner.url },\n          React.createElement('img', {\n            className: _this4.state.currentBanner === index ? _this4.state.imgClassName : '',\n            src: _this4.PATH + banner.file,\n            hidden: _this4.state.currentBanner !== index\n          })\n        );\n      });\n\n      return React.createElement(\n        'div',\n        null,\n        React.createElement(\n          'div',\n          {\n            className: 'review__banner',\n            onMouseEnter: function onMouseEnter() {\n              return clearInterval(_this4.state.timer);\n            },\n            onMouseLeave: function onMouseLeave() {\n              return _this4.slideBanner();\n            } },\n          banners,\n          React.createElement(\n            'div',\n            {\n              className: 'review__prev',\n              onClick: this.prevBanner },\n            React.createElement('i', {\n              className: 'fa fa-chevron-left fa-lg',\n              'aria-hidden': 'true'\n            })\n          ),\n          React.createElement(\n            'div',\n            {\n              className: 'review__next',\n              onClick: this.nextBanner },\n            React.createElement('i', {\n              className: 'fa fa-chevron-right fa-lg',\n              'aria-hidden': 'true'\n            })\n          )\n        ),\n        React.createElement(ReviewNav, {\n          banners: this.props.banners,\n          currentBanner: this.state.currentBanner,\n          goToBanner: this.goToBanner\n        })\n      );\n    }\n  }]);\n\n  return ReviewBanner;\n}(React.Component);\n\nvar ReviewNav = function (_React$Component3) {\n  _inherits(ReviewNav, _React$Component3);\n\n  function ReviewNav() {\n    _classCallCheck(this, ReviewNav);\n\n    return _possibleConstructorReturn(this, (ReviewNav.__proto__ || Object.getPrototypeOf(ReviewNav)).apply(this, arguments));\n  }\n\n  _createClass(ReviewNav, [{\n    key: 'render',\n    value: function render() {\n      var _this6 = this;\n\n      var reviewButtons = this.props.banners.map(function (banner, index) {\n        return React.createElement('li', {\n          className: _this6.props.banners[_this6.props.currentBanner] === banner ? 'review__button review__button--active' : 'review__button',\n          onClick: function onClick() {\n            return _this6.props.goToBanner(index);\n          }\n        });\n      });\n\n      return React.createElement(\n        'div',\n        { className: 'review__nav' },\n        React.createElement(\n          'ul',\n          null,\n          reviewButtons\n        )\n      );\n    }\n  }]);\n\n  return ReviewNav;\n}(React.Component);\n\nReactDOM.render(React.createElement(Review, null), document.querySelectorAll('li.ipsWidget.ipsWidget_horizontal.ipsBox')[0].parentNode.appendChild(document.createElement('div')));\n//# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;charset=utf-8;base64,</script></head>\n\t<body class=\"ipsApp ipsApp_front ipsClearfix    ipsfocus_guest scrollBackgroundd ipsJS_has ipsApp_noTouch wTablet\" id=\"elNavigationMore_2_dropdown_menu\" data-role=\"moreDropdown\"></ul>\n\t\t\t\t\t</li>\n\t\t\t\t</ul>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t</li>\n\t\n\n\t\n\t\t\n\t\t\n\t\t<li id=\"elNavSecondary_14\" data-role=\"navBarItem\" data-navapp=\"core\" data-navext=\"Leaderboard\" data-navtitle=\"Leaderboard\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t<a href=\"https://www.monochrome-heaven.com/leaderboard/\" data-navitem-id=\"14\">\n\t\t\t\t\tLeaderboard\n\t\t\t\t</a>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t</li>\n\t\n\n              \t<li class=\"focusNav_more focusNav_hidden\">\n                \t<a href=\"#\"> More <i class=\"fa fa-caret-down\"></i></a>\n                \t<ul class=\"ipsNavBar_secondary\"></ul>\n                </li>\n\t\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</nav>\n\n</div></div>\n                </div>\n            </div></header>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t\n      \t<div class=\"contentWrapper ipsLayout_container\">\n          \n          \t<div id=\"userBar\">\n\t          \t<div class=\"flex id=\"elSignInLink\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t<a href=\"https://www.monochrome-heaven.com/login/\" data-ipsmenu-closeonclick=\"false\" data-ipsmenu=\"\" id=\"elUserSignIn\">\n\t\t\t\t\tExisting user? data-role=\"loginForm\">\n\t\t\n\t\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\n<form accept-charset=\"utf-8\" class=\"ipsPad ipsForm ipsForm_vertical\" method=\"post\" action=\"https://www.monochrome-heaven.com/login/\" class=\"ipsDataItem_title ipsType_large ipsType_break\">\n\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t<a help or support, feel free to ask questions here.\n</p>\n</div>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t\n\t\t\t<div class=\"ipsDataItem_stats class=\"ipsDataItem_title ipsType_large ipsType_break\">\n\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t<a href=\"https://www.monochrome-heaven.com/forum/12-reviews/\">Reviews</a>\n\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t</h4>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t<ul class=\"ipsDataItem_subList Reviews</a>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t</li>\n\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t</ul>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"ipsDataItem_meta ipsType_richText ipsContained\">\n<p>Post your thoughts on artist's releases.</p>\n</div>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t\n\t\t\t<div class=\"ipsDataItem_stats ipsDataItem_statsLarge\">\n\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t<dl>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<dt
